posts.author: TheChaplain
posts.content:
Hey, I'm starting to play on arelith fut I've no idea what build/concept to play and I'm nota good builder and would require some help, if you have any suggestions other than the one I mention please do tell me.

Battle-Chaplian:
I was thinking this battle-chaplian as perhaps something with like dual kamas dex-based (18 Cleric/6 Monk/6 Fighter?). I've no ideas how to build, only suggestions.

The Wanderer:
A silent unoticed wandere possing great magical powers and can fight back if so would be needed. (Wizard/rogue with focus in transmutation/conjuration/abjuration) Perhaps?

Templar of Tempus:
Simply, a warrior of Tempus (non-Cleric). No idea what classes etc here.

As I mentioned any help would be most appreciated. (And I'd love if the build could handle some PvP without being absolutly useless )

posts.author: SolidusMath
posts.content:
Hey there Chaplin I also play on Arelith and think that you would have fun with any of these concepts. You can actually find several builds in this very section you posted in as we Arelithians are known to need help with builds often. Most of the Arelith build requests are marked with a (Arelith) in the title, If I had more time tonight I would link some of the cooler ones but I suspect that one of the guild members will help you out soon enough.

Anyways...Cya IG
